SELECT COUNT( DISTINCT ( T_STK_INSTOCKENTRY.FENTRYID ) ) AS COUNT, T_STK_INSTOCK.FDATE, T_STK_INSTOCK.FBILLNO, T_STK_INSTOCKENTRY.FPOORDERNO, T_BD_STOCK.FNUMBER, T_BD_STOCK_L.FNAME FROM T_STK_INSTOCK LEFT JOIN T_STK_INSTOCKENTRY ON T_STK_INSTOCK.FID = T_STK_INSTOCKENTRY.FID LEFT JOIN T_ORG_ORGANIZATIONS_L ON T_STK_INSTOCK.FSTOCKORGID = T_ORG_ORGANIZATIONS_L.FORGID LEFT JOIN T_BD_STOCK_L ON T_STK_INSTOCKENTRY.FSTOCKID = T_BD_STOCK_L.FSTOCKID LEFT JOIN T_BD_STOCK ON T_STK_INSTOCKENTRY.FSTOCKID = T_BD_STOCK.FSTOCKID
WHERE T_ORG_ORGANIZATIONS_L.FORGID ='${organ}'
AND DATEDIFF( day, T_STK_INSTOCK.FDATE, getdate ( ) ) = 0
AND DATEDIFF( month, T_STK_INSTOCK.FDATE, getdate ( ) ) = 0
AND DATEDIFF( year, T_STK_INSTOCK.FDATE, getdate ( ) ) = 0
GROUP BY T_STK_INSTOCK.FDATE, T_STK_INSTOCK.FBILLNO, T_STK_INSTOCKENTRY.FPOORDERNO, T_BD_STOCK.FNUMBER, T_BD_STOCK_L.FNAME ORDER BY T_STK_INSTOCK.FBILLNO DESC

SELECT T_BD_MATERIAL.FNUMBER, LEFT(T_BD_MATERIAL_L.FNAME,30) AS FNAME, left(T_BD_MATERIAL_L.FSPECIFICATION,30) AS FSPECIFICATION, LEFT(T_STK_INSTOCKENTRY.FLOT_TEXT,30) AS FLOT_TEXT, LEFT(T_STK_INSTOCKENTRY.FREALQTY,30) AS FREALQTY, left(T_STK_INSTOCKSERIAL.FSERIALNO,30) AS FSERIALNO FROM T_STK_INSTOCK LEFT JOIN T_STK_INSTOCKENTRY ON T_STK_INSTOCK.FID = T_STK_INSTOCKENTRY.FID LEFT JOIN T_BD_MATERIAL ON T_STK_INSTOCKENTRY.FMATERIALID = T_BD_MATERIAL.FMATERIALID LEFT JOIN T_BD_MATERIAL_L ON T_STK_INSTOCKENTRY.FMATERIALID = T_BD_MATERIAL_L.FMATERIALID LEFT JOIN T_STK_INSTOCKSERIAL ON T_STK_INSTOCKENTRY.FENTRYID = T_STK_INSTOCKSERIAL.FENTRYID
WHERE T_STK_INSTOCK.FBILLNO = '${fbillno}'
AND T_STK_INSTOCKENTRY.FPOORDERNO='${dgillno}'
WHERE T_STK_INSTOCKENTRY.FENTRYID IN ( ${fid} )
GROUP BY T_BD_MATERIAL.FNUMBER, T_BD_MATERIAL_L.FNAME, T_STK_INSTOCKENTRY.FREALQTY, T_BD_MATERIAL_L.FSPECIFICATION, T_STK_INSTOCKENTRY.FLOT_TEXT, T_STK_INSTOCKSERIAL.FSERIALNO

SELECT T_STK_INSTOCK.FBILLNO, T_STK_INSTOCKENTRY.FENTRYID, T_STK_INSTOCK.FDATE, T_STK_INSTOCK.FDOCUMENTSTATUS, T_BD_MATERIAL.FNUMBER, T_BD_MATERIAL_L.FNAME, T_BD_STOCK_L.FNAME AS MANE, org.FNAME AS ORGNAME, org1.FNAME AS ORG1NAME, T_STK_INSTOCKENTRY.FLOT, T_BD_UNIT_L.FNAME AS UNITNAME, T_STK_INSTOCKENTRY.FREALQTY FROM T_STK_INSTOCK LEFT JOIN T_STK_INSTOCKENTRY ON T_STK_INSTOCK.FID = T_STK_INSTOCKENTRY.FID LEFT JOIN T_ORG_ORGANIZATIONS_L org1 ON T_STK_INSTOCK.FPURCHASEORGID = org1.FORGID LEFT JOIN T_ORG_ORGANIZATIONS_L org ON T_STK_INSTOCK.FSTOCKORGID = org.FORGID LEFT JOIN T_BD_STOCK_L ON T_STK_INSTOCKENTRY.FSTOCKID = T_BD_STOCK_L.FSTOCKID LEFT JOIN T_BD_STOCK ON T_STK_INSTOCKENTRY.FSTOCKID = T_BD_STOCK.FSTOCKID LEFT JOIN T_BD_MATERIAL ON T_STK_INSTOCKENTRY.FMATERIALID = T_BD_MATERIAL.FMATERIALID LEFT JOIN T_BD_MATERIAL_L ON T_STK_INSTOCKENTRY.FMATERIALID = T_BD_MATERIAL_L.FMATERIALID LEFT JOIN T_BD_UNIT_L ON T_STK_INSTOCKENTRY.FUNITID = T_BD_UNIT_L.FUNITID WHERE 1=1
AND (T_STK_INSTOCK.FBILLNO like '%${searchValue}%' OR T_BD_MATERIAL.FNUMBER like '%${searchValue}%' OR T_BD_MATERIAL_L.FNAME like '%${searchValue}%' OR T_BD_STOCK_L.FNAME like '%${searchValue}%' OR org.FNAME like '%${searchValue}%' OR org1.FNAME like '%${searchValue}%' OR T_STK_INSTOCKENTRY.FLOT like '%${searchValue}%')
AND org.FNAME ='${organ}'
GROUP BY T_STK_INSTOCK.FBILLNO, T_STK_INSTOCK.FDATE, T_STK_INSTOCK.FDOCUMENTSTATUS, T_BD_MATERIAL.FNUMBER, T_STK_INSTOCKENTRY.FENTRYID, T_BD_MATERIAL_L.FNAME, T_BD_STOCK_L.FNAME, org.FNAME, org1.FNAME, T_STK_INSTOCKENTRY.FLOT, T_BD_UNIT_L.FNAME, T_STK_INSTOCKENTRY.FREALQTY
order by ${column} ${sort}
